version_description: Have you let your friend know about Dave? If you refer a friend, you both will earn a free month of Dave! I also fixed some bugs.
My Side Hustle feature has a brand new gig for you! Now you can earn gift cards and cash right from my app just by taking surveys and watching videos.

Have a question about Dave Banking? I'm making it easier than ever to quickly give you answers in my Help Center. I also added Gazelle to my Side Hustle feature. Now you can sell your used phone or laptop right through my app.

I'm making Dave Banking even better! Depositing a check is now easier than ever. I'm also helping you protect your stuff! Lemonade and Dave have teamed up to give you easy access to renters' insurance for as little as $5 a month right through my app.
Do you need a Side Hustle? I can connect you with different side hustles in my app. I updated Side Hustle to make it even better for you. I also squashed some bugs.
I made some minor improvements to my app and squashed some bugs.
You like my app? Gee, thanks, just updated it. I updated the home screen to be even more informative and squashed some bugs.
I made it easier for you to connect your bank account (safely and securely). I also squashed some bugs.
Everything's going great. Wanted to say hey to all the new people trying out my app.
Everything's going great. Wanted to say hey to all the new people trying out my app.
Dave members can now access a wider range of funds.
Dave’s crushing bugs and taking names.
Fixed a bug causing crashes when connecting to Facebook.

We made it easier for you to plant trees and fixed some bugs.

Fact: Bears love trees.
Bears. Trees. Battlestar Galactica.
I may not have a summer bod, but I made it easier for you to add your paycheck.

This Independence Day, celebrate independence from overdrafts! It’s even easier with these new updates to my app: If you pull to refresh on the homepage you can now update your account balance. I also got some fresh new gear so you’ll see me looking fly. Yeah, bears go on shopping sprees too.

P.S-Why did the bear get fired from his job? Tweet your answer to @davesavesyou
I made it easier to add your debit card, made things move a little faster and got some new digs for summer. Update and tell me how I look at @davesavesyou

I updated the home screen to show your available balance, which includes pending transactions.

Dave Tip: Your bank can sometimes re-order pending transactions. Missing these transactions can cause you to overdraft more than once.
I made it easier for you to connect your bank account (safely and securely). I also squashed some bugs.
Every bug can become a beautiful butterfly.  I turned some little bugs into a blossoming butterfly garden. It’s now easier for you to help me plant some trees and leave me a pawsitive review.
Are you a Lyft or Uber driver? If you’ve requested an advance before, try again. I’ve improved the process for you and fixed some bugs.
Need a better way to budget? I’ve got your back. I’ll automatically predict your expenses, so you can better prepare for that late night Taco Bell run.
I work hard to be your lifesaver. When you update the app, you’ll see my sweet new look. I also kicked some bugs to the curb.
I (or rather our users) found an issue that prevented you from entering the Advances tab. It’s now fixed.
I made it easier for you to reconnect your bank account. I also swatted away some pesky bugs.
I made it easier to get an advance and log in with a new phone number. I also squashed a few bugs.

Now, it’s easier to get your questions answered right in my app. Just tap "Get answers to your questions".

Did you know? If you pull down on the home screen, your bank account balance will refresh.

If you have a part-time gig, I made it easier for you to qualify for an advance. I also fixed some bugs.

If you have any ideas or suggestions to make our app even better, please send your ideas to davethebear@dave.com.

In this release, I improved how you add your paycheck. You can now see what type of advance your paycheck qualifies you for.

I (or rather our users) found an issue that paid advances showed as past due. This is now fixed.
I want you to have the best experience possible. I got rid of some bugs this week.
I’m already getting in the Halloween spirit. Check out my new costumes In this update.
My goal is to help you thrive paycheck to paycheck. I made some updates to improve your experience in my app.
Don’t want your friends to ask you for cash? Let them in on your secret and tell your friends about my app.
Thanks to you I’ve now planted over 1 million trees! This week I made a few bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Thanks to you I’ve now planted over 1 million trees! This week I made a few bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Have a side hustle? You can now use more than one paycheck to qualify for an advance.
I got ready for Thanksgiving and squashed some bugs this week.
Happy Thanksgiving! I'm beary thankful for all of you. I fixed some bugs this week.
I'm getting ready for the holidays. Check out my new looks in this update. I also squashed some bugs.
I fixed some bugs and updated a few things to make your experience better than ever.
Minor improvements on how to view your account balance and squashed some bugs.
Bears are known to hibernate, but I'm not! I’m here for you if money is tight over the holidays. This update, I fixed some behind the scenes bugs to make your experience easier.
I’ve made a few bug fixes and performance improvements to get ready for a beary good year.
Happy New Year! I updated a few items to make sure you're off to a great start this year.
I squashed some bugs this week and made some improvements to your experience.
I update my app regularly to make it faster and more reliable for you. Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps us going!
I squashed some bugs and made some improvements to make your experience even better.
This week I focused on fixing bugs and getting new features ready for you. Stay tuned for some exciting news.
I squashed some bugs and made some improvements to make your experience even better.
This week I worked on fixing some bugs and improved performance.
I made it easier for you to delete expenses and fixed some bugs behind the scenes.
Minor improvements on how to add your expenses and squashed some bugs.
I’ve spruced up the low balance alerts in the latest update. I also fixed some bugs.
Did you know you can apply for side hustles right in the Dave App? This week I added new side hustle opportunities. I also squashed some bugs.
Did you know you can apply for side hustles right in the Dave App? This week I added new side hustle opportunities. I also squashed some bugs.
I update my app regularly to make sure you have the best experience possible. This version includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
This week I squashed some bugs and made some performance improvements.
This week I squashed some bugs and made some performance improvements.
Spring has sprung and I'm rocking some new looks. I also fixed some bugs.
I fixed some bugs and made it easier for you to see if you qualify for an advance.
I made some usual tweaks and fixes to make your experience even better!
Thank you beary much for using Dave! I updated my app to make it faster and more reliable for you.
What’s the password? I updated my app to make it even safer and keep out any intruders.
You like my app? Gee, thanks, just updated it. I updated the home screen to be even more informative and squashed some bugs.
Banking for Humans is here! Sign up by clicking the banking tab in your app. Can’t wait to hear what you think!
I'm just a bear who likes long walks on the beach and for my app to look great and ready for summer. I updated my app to make it easier to use and I squashed some bugs.
Have you let your friend know about Dave? If you refer a friend, you both will earn a free month of Dave! I also fixed some bugs.
I made some minor improvements to my app and squashed some bugs.
Do you need a Side Hustle? I can connect you with different side hustles in my app. I updated Side Hustle to make it even better for you. I also squashed some bugs.
Thanks for using my app! I'm always working to improve your experience. This update I fixed some bugs and polished up my app.

I'm making Dave Banking even better! Depositing a check is now easier than ever. I'm also helping you protect your stuff! Lemonade and Dave have teamed up to give you easy access to renters' insurance for as little as $5 a month right through my app.

Have a question about Dave Banking? I'm making it easier than ever to quickly give you answers in my Help Center. I also added Gazelle to my Side Hustle feature. Now you can sell your used phone or laptop right through my app.
My Side Hustle feature has a brand new gig for you! Now you can earn gift cards and cash right from my app just by taking surveys and watching videos.
My goal is to help you thrive paycheck to paycheck. I made some updates to improve your experience in my app.

Wondering where all of your $$ is going? Now it's easier than ever to track! My app gives you more detail into your transactions and helps you manage your money better by quickly adding an expense to your dave budget with a single click.
I squashed some bugs this week and made my app even easier to use!
I squashed some bugs this week and made my app even easier to use!
Now getting an advance is easier (and better looking) than ever before! I also updated my help center!
When you set up a direct deposit with Dave I can give you an advance up to $100 to protect you from overdraft fees. Now setting one up is easier than ever! I also squashed some bugs!
Wondering where your Dave advance is? Now my app shows you exactly when it will be yours to spend on the bear essentials (like rent for your den!).
This week’s release includes lots of small changes to make sure Dave Banking, my new checking account, is the best way to manage your honey.
This week’s release includes lots of small changes to make sure Dave Banking, my new checking account, is the best way to manage your honey.
Have a question for me? I updated my help center!
I squashed some bugs this week and made my app even easier to use!
Thanks for using my app! I'm always working to improve your experience. This update I fixed some bugs and polished up my app.
This week's release makes my app even easier to use. I also squashed some bugs!

I'm making my app even better for Dave Banking customers! If you received a debit card but haven't yet activated it, I'll now remind you and make it easy for you to get started. Ready to fund your Dave Banking account and start building your credit, just by paying rent on time? Now you'll see a button in the app notifying you that your checking account is ready to go, but hasn't been funded yet.
This week’s release makes my app even easier to use. I also squashed some bugs!
This week's release makes my app even easier to use. I also squashed some bugs!
I fixed some bugs this week and made my app easier than ever to use!
This week I'm updating my budgeting feature with a new place to see and manage your expenses!
This week I made some improvements to my app that make it faster than ever!

Now your paycheck will hit your account up to two days earlier when you set up direct deposit with Dave Banking! Have a friend who I could help? Now when you refer them, I'll donate a meal to a family through my partnership with Feeding America!

I made some bear-y big changes to my app so that it’s easier than ever for you to budget! Now when you open my app, I’ll show you the money you have “Available to Spend” before your next paycheck. I’m also making it easier for you to track your expenses by showing you which of your bills have been paid!

Now your paycheck will hit your account up to two days earlier when you set up direct deposit with Dave Banking! Have a friend who I could help? Now when you refer them, I'll donate a meal to a family through my partnership with Feeding America!

Whew, busy week this week. It was a bear of a project, but now it’s even easier to tell how much money you can spend before your next paycheck.

- Easier for you to budget your money each month
You’ll now see how much money you have “Available to spend” before your next paycheck. I’ve done all the math for you by predicting your upcoming expenses.

- Know what bills are already paid
I’ve marked which bills you’ve paid each month so you know what’s already taken care of.

If you run into any issues that are just un-bear-able, please let me know at davecares@dave.com.

I heard a crazy story earlier this week about a little girl sneaking into a house, eating all the porridge, ruining all the furniture and sleeping in all the beds. It still keeps me up at night.

On the bright side, I used the extra time to add more information to the status of your advances. That way, you always know where your money is and when it should arrive.

If you run into any issues that are just un-bear-able, please let me know at davecares@dave.com.

You know how sometimes you wish you could just pause a membership for a bit, but not necessarily cancel it? That’s basically me with my gym every other month.

Well, I thought having something like that might be helpful for people who use my app too. So now you have the option of pausing your Dave membership for a period of time instead of canceling and resubscribing later.

If you run into any issues that are just un-bear-able, please go to support.dave.com to get some help.

What do bears and bugs have in common? Nothing. That’s why I removed a bunch of them from the app this week.

If you run into any issues that are just un-bear-able, please go to https://support.dave.com to get some help.

This week, I...
- Improved a few features to make the app even better
- Learned why you’re not supposed to squash bugs with your phone
- Bought a new phone

If you run into any issues that are just un-bear-able, please go to https://support.dave.com to get some help.

This release, I decided to remove a few bugs. Two of them agreed it wasn’t a good fit and we’ve parted ways. The third made a really good case for staying, so I promoted it to “feature” instead.

If you run into any issues that are just un-bear-able, please go to https://support.dave.com to get some help.

I’m partnering with companies to create side jobs you can do without leaving home, just in case you find yourself cooped up at home during these tough times. Here are two options with more on the way.

- Swagbucks
Earn gift cards for taking surveys, watching videos, shopping online and more.

- Survey Junkie
Get paid to share your opinion on cool products or services.

If you run into any issues that are just un-bear-able, please go to https://support.dave.com/ to get some help.

As America and the world continue dealing with these tough times, I want to make sure I’m doing what I can to help people out. So keep an eye on your inbox for my ‘Dave’s here for you’ emails each week.

If you run into any issues that are just un-bear-able, please go to https://support.dave.com to get some help.

As these tough times continue, I want to do as much as possible to give people financial peace of mind across America. So this week, I worked on improving Side Hustle, my job-finding tool, to add and create more job opportunities you can do from the safety and comfort of your home.

If you run into any issues that are just un-bear-able, please go to https://support.dave.com to get some help.

I’m a bear. Bears love nature, and that includes bugs. But not in my app. So for this release, I tracked some down and removed them.

If you run into any issues that are just un-bear-able, please go to https://support.dave.com to get some help.

I gave several bugs a chance to be promoted to feature this release. Unfortunately, none of them were koalafied enough, so I had to remove them instead.

This week, I put my paws to work making it easier to understand how to get approved for an advance. I also added resources to help people out who’ve lost their jobs due to current events.

Have you ever seen someone lie to a bear? I have. It … didn’t go well. You see, despite all the fur, bears are very transparent creatures. We tell it like it is.

That’s why I spent this last week putting more information into the app about how to get approved for larger advances and how to take advantage of your Dave Banking account.

As always, if you run into any issues that are just un-bear-able, please go to https://support.dave.com for some help.

Bears are fiercely independent creatures. So, for a long time, I didn’t think my app needed a help center. What bear would need that kind of help?!

Then I got a few complaints from the local grizzlies.

Anyways, this release, I updated the help center in my app to make it easier and more intuitive to use. Now you can get the help you need in just a few clicks.

As always, if you run into any issues that are just un-bear-able, please go to https://support.dave.com for some help.

Lots of devices aren’t exactly “bear paw-friendly” these days. And there’s nothing that annoys me more than having my debit card get locked because I fat-fingered my PIN a few times. So now, if you run into a similar situation, my app will give you a heads up. That way, you can reset your PIN to unlock your card, or know if someone else has gotten a hold of it.

As always, if you run into any issues that are just un-bear-able, please go to https://support.dave.com for some help.

This release, the Side Hustle feature got a refresh. Sometimes you need more money, but life gets in the way. So I rebuilt Side Hustle to help you find jobs that fit your day and your life.

Whether you need a part-time gig, a temp job or have to work from home, Side Hustle will help you find work no matter your schedule or situation.

I spent the last week updating how you move money in your Dave app to make transfers even easier. The biggest change? No more looking up account and routing numbers. Now, you can fund your spending account with a debit card.

As always, if you run into any issues, please go to https://support.dave.com for some help.

You know one of the most annoying things about being a bear? When I go to the bank to cash a check, every bank teller just runs away. Like, come on. I've got a check to cash and a schedule to keep!

So I went ahead and created a new mobile check deposit feature. Now, all bears (and humans) can put checks into their spending account right from their phone. No more terrified screams from bank tellers.

As always, if you run into any issues, please go to https://support.dave.com for some help.
